features.name: Paragon Power
features.description:
At the end of another creature's turn, you may regain one reaction and choose one of the following:
A. Act: Take an action. You may also spend some or all of your remaining movement as part of that action.
B. Resist: Reroll a saving throw against an ongoing effect. Spend 6 hit points to gain advantage on the roll.

features.name: Savagery
features.description: When you hit a prone target with an attack, you may add 3 (1d6) extra damage.

features.name: Gore
features.description: Melee: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

features.name: Headbutt
features.description: Save: DC 14 vs STR, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target is prone.

features.name: Furious Charge
features.description: Save: DC 14 vs DEX, a 10 ft. wide, 30 ft long line starting from you, all targets. Effect: You move to the end of the line without provoking attacks of opportunity. Hit: 4 (1d8 +3) bludgeoning damage. and the target is knocked prone Miss: The target can slide 5 ft. out of the area.

features.name: Shove
features.description: Save: DC 14 vs STR, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target is pushed 10 ft.
